doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 7/17/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 7/17/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, David Strah, Jewelle Gomez, and Darryl Yates-Rist, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2. Discussion about mandatory AIDS testing for everyone and coming outCOMMERCIAL: Human Rights Campaign Fund3. Discussion with Darryl Yates-Rist about his travels across the USA and his experiences with various gay communities.COMMERCIAL: GCN Fundraiser4.Introduction of the group ACT-UP (AIDS Coalition to Unleash Power)5.News watch, John Paul II's visit to San Francisco prompts antviolence statement between gay community leaders and the Roman Catholic Diocese of San Francisco2. John [Wahlia] of Zambia, Africa is at a controversy for not sleeping with widowed sister-in-law whose husband died of AIDS3. Rev. Rose Mary Denman, Methodist minister and lesbian takes a leave of abscense in a effort to change Methodist position on being a practicing gay ministerCOMMERCIAL: L'image5.GCN Sports, Dr. Tom Waddell, founder of Gay Games, died from complications due to AIDS, rundown of sports results, "Spy Magazine" report about an 18'' rubber penis in locker room, and clip of 16 year old gymnist Trent DavisCOMMERCIAL: First Hand6. Lavender Health, Interview with David Worthheimer, Execuitve Director of Lesbian and Gay Anti-Violence Project, talks about organization.7.Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Naming Names, criticism of Regan nominee, US Circuit Court Judge Robert Bork to Supreme CourtCOMMERCIAL:L'imageCOMMERCIAL:Manscape2.GCN soap opera "SUDS" episode, "Playmates"COMMERCIAL:The MonsterCOMMERCIAL:L'Image3.GCN soap opera, "SUDS" episode, "Playmates"
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 30 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 7/17/1987]: July 1987
